column4: hi guys... i have a usb disk connected with 1 ntfs and 1 fat32 partition... i want to install ubuntu to the fat32 partition but it doesnt show up in gparted
your exrernal hard drive probably is sda, so try "sudo mount /dev/sda1 /your/mountpoint"
if you don't like sudo, you can set the root password with "sudp passwd"
